title: Leakage protective device (LPD)
fullText:
The following devices are LPDs:
(a)	Low-voltage isolation transformers in accordance with AS/NZS 4510.
(b)	Type I low-voltage residual current devices (RCDs) in accordance with AS/NZS 3190, AS/NZS 61008.1 or AS/NZS 61009.1.
NOTE: Clauses 2.8.1 to 2.8.8 specify requirements for RCDs that are used as LPDs.
